description: A FastAPI-based application that implements the Model Context Protocol for lead prospecting, allowing users to retrieve business leads from different data sources like Mantiks through a clean architecture.

ALLOWED_ORIGINS.description: List of allowed origins for CORS configuration

MANTIKS_API_KEY.description: API key for authenticating with the Mantiks API

MANTIKS_API_BASE.description: Base URL for the Mantiks API

name: Prospectio API MCP
